pages.text:
The Hamilton Family – Owners Since 1964
Thank You for 60+ Years of Patronage
FAQs
Are you a musician looking to perform at the Palm Pavilion?
We are an extremely casual restaurant. We typically feature solo artists during the week in the afternoon and evenings. We feature duos and trios, sometimes on Friday and Saturday evening. They are usually booked at least 30 days in advance.
Our bookings are handled by an outside vendor. If you are interested in performing, please
click here
.
If the vendor has not responded to you after 30 days, please use the Contact Us form to let us know.
Thank you.
Are you looking to host a group event - rehearsal dinner, wedding reception, anniversary party, shower, etc.?
During the pandemic, we were required to reduce our seating and space between seats. As such, we no longer offer group events. A number of our neighboring hotels and restaurants do offer meeting rooms and group event space.
The local chamber of commerce maintains a
list of local businesses
.
Can I make a reservation?
Unfortunately no. We’ve never taken reservations. The Palm Pavilion is first-come and first-serve.
We know a number of widgets flow data into Google and others travel sites that indicate we offer reservations. We do not.
We are working to get Open Table, Single Platform, Google and others to have this incorrect information removed, again.
Do you offer gluten free items on your menu? Vegetarian?
Yes, we do, please go to our
online menu here
.
As your review it, you will see the letters “gf” in green ink.
Those interested in vegetarian options, as there are many types of vegetarians, we asked you to review the menu and see which items will match your needs.
